caller_intent: Amanda Lyndbury is following up on a request to confirm if her policy has been updated to list her as the 'first and only marketing under policy' after sending an email requesting the change.
resolution_steps: Agent asked when the email was sent and confirmed it was sent the previous day.
Agent inquired about the email's content to verify details.
Agent attempted to contact Gary Belcher (mentioned by caller) to clarify the request.
knowledge_required: Email verification procedures for policy updates
Internal escalation protocols for unresolved requests
summary: Amanda Lyndbury follows up on a policy update request, confirming she sent an email yesterday. The agent verifies details and escalates to Gary Belcher for further clarification, with the call being transferred mid-conversation.
